伝説上: (でんせつじょう) - legendary; fabled; fabulous
伝送: (でんそう) - transmission; communication; circulation; dissemination; diffusion; propagation; delivery
伝送スピード: (でんそうスピード) - transmission speed
伝送ブロック終結: (でんそうブロックしゅうけつ) - end of transmission block; ETB
伝送制御プロトコル: (でんそうせいぎょプロトコル) - Transmission Control Protocol; TCP
伝送制御拡張: (でんそうせいぎょかくちょう) - datalink escape; DLE
伝送制御文字: (でんそうせいぎょもじ) - transmission control character
伝送品質: (でんそうひんしつ) - transmission quality
伝送損失: (でんそうそんしつ) - transmission loss
伝送故障: (でんそうこしょう) - transmission fault
伝送終了: (でんそうしゅうりょう) - end of transmission; EOT
伝送経路遅延: (でんそうけいろちえん) - transmission path delay; one-way propagation time
伝送路: (でんそうろ) - line; transmission line; transmission path; transmission route; link
伝送路長: (でんそうろちょう) - link length
伝送速度: (でんそうそくど) - transmission speed; baud rate
伝送遅延変動: (でんそうちえんへんどう) - transmission delay variation
伝道: (でんどう) - proselytizing; evangelism; missionary work
伝道者: (でんどうしゃ) - evangelist; evangelistic worker
伝道集会: (でんどうしゅうかい) - evangelistic meeting
伝達: (でんたつ) - transmission (e.g. news, chemical signals, electricity); communication; delivery; conveyance; transfer; relay; propagation; conduction
伝達会社: (でんたつかいしゃ) - (power, electricity) transmission company
伝達性海綿状脳症: (でんたつせいかいめんじょうのうしょう) - {med} transmissible spongiform encephalopathy; TSE
伝達情報量: (でんたつじょうほうりょう) - transinformation (content); transferred information; transmitted information; mutual information
伝達手段: (でんたつしゅだん) - means of communication; media of communication; organ of communication; tool of communication
伝達特性: (でんたつとくせい) - transfer characteristic
伝達関数: (でんたつかんすう) - transfer function
伝録: (でんろく) - reciting something and then recording it; recording of something that has been recited
伝音器: (でんおんき) - megaphone; speaking tube; sound box
伯: (haku) - chefe, conde; principal responsável do Departamento de Adoração
伯仲: (はくちゅう) - matching someone; being equal with; being on a par; being well contested
伯備線: (はくびせん) - Hakubi Line (West Tottori-Okayama Railway)
伯叔: (はくしゅく) - brothers; one's father's brothers
伯家神道: (はくけしんとう) - Hakke Shinto (Shinto tradition transmitted by the House of Hakuo Shirakawa); Hakuke Shinto
伯楽: (はくらく) - cattle or horse trader; good judge of horses or cattle
伯母さん: (おばさん) - (伯母さん is older than one's parent and 叔母さん is younger) aunt
伯父さん: (オジサン) - (伯父さん is older than one's parent and 叔父さん is younger) uncle; (usu. 小父さん or おじさん) old man/mister (vocative); (usu. オジサン) manybar goatfish (Parupeneus multifasciatus)
伯父御: (おじご) - (伯父御 or 叔父御 can mean older or younger than one's parent)  uncle
估券: (こけん) - dignity/credit/public estimation/face/honor/reputation; deed of sale (for a land, forest or house); sale value/selling price
伴う: (tomonau) - acompanhar, andar de mãos dadas com, ser consequência de; ser acompanhado por, trazer consigo, levar junto, estar envolvido em
伴なう: (ともなう) - to accompany; to bring with; to be accompanied by; to be involved in; to be consequent upon
伴侶動物: (はんりょどうぶつ) - companion animal; pet
伴僧: (ばんそう) - priests assisting at a Buddhist service
伴天連: (バテレン) - Portuguese Jesuits (in Japan in the 16th century) (por: padre); Christianity/Christian
伴船: (ともぶね) - consort ship; joint boarding/boarding a ship together
伴走: (ばんそう) - running alongside; pacesetting; accompanying
伴連れ: (ともづれ) - following someone through a locked door, thus obtaining unauthorized access
伴食: (ばんしょく) - eating with a guest; nominal official (a slighting term)
伴食大臣: (ばんしょくだいじん) - (yoji) nominal (figurehead) minister; titular minister
伴食宰相: (ばんしょくさいしょう) - (yoji) incompetent cabinet minister; figurehead minister
伸し上がる: (のしあがる) - to stand on tiptoe; to rise in the world; to become arrogant
伸し上げる: (のしあげる) - to promote; to make richer
伸し掛かる: (のしかかる) - to lean on/to weigh on; to bend over/to lean forward
伸し掛る: (のしかかる) - to lean on/to weigh on; to bend over/to lean forward
伸す: (のす) - to stretch/to extend/to lengthen/to spread; to gain influence/to become stronger/to increase (e.g. in scope); to go further; to smooth out/to roll out; to spread out (something folded); to iron; to knock out/to knock down
伸ばす: (nobasu) - to grow long (ex.: cabelo, unhas); to lengthen, to extend, to stretch , to grow long (e.g. hair, nails); to lengthen, to extend, to stretch; to reach out, to hold out; to straighten, to smooth out
伸び: (nobi) - growth, development; stretching (o corpo de alguém, por exemplo, ao acordar) , growth, development; stretching (one's body, e.g. when waking up); (ability to) spread (of paint, cream, etc.); elongation, extension, carry (e.g. of sound), sustain
伸びしろ: (のびしろ) - room for growth; potential; promise
伸びる: (nobiru) - to stretch, to extend, to lengthen, to grow (de cabelo, altura, grama, etc.); to straighten out, to be flattened, to become smooth , to stretch, to extend, to lengthen, to grow (of hair, height, grass, etc.); to straighten out, to be flattened, to become smooth; to spread (of paint, cream, etc.); to stretch out (e.g. of a hand), to extend
伸び上がる: (のびあがる) - to stretch; to reach to; to stand on tiptoe
伸び代: (のびしろ) - room for growth; potential; promise
